title: Temple of Aphrodite Euploia
description: The temple of Aphrodite Euploia is a tholos constructed in the fourth century BC in Knidos, a coastal city on the Dat√ßa Peninsula. It was built to house Praxiteles' famous nude statue of Aphrodite.
